metadata.title: How to debug (RH850 ICUM) using E2 emulator and CS+

sections.content:
Question:
Is it possible to debug the ICUM core of a RH850 MCU using the Renesas E2-Emulator and CS+?
Answer:
Debugging the ICUM core with E2 and CS+ is possible. You need a different device file (= dvf file) to do this. Kindly request the same through Renesas Online Support. The shared CS+ patch will guide you how to replace the required files in your CS+ installation.
Note:
NDA is required for security-related support such as a request to get a security-related file. Contact our sales representative or distributor for details.
  For debugging the ICUM core with GHS MULTI, you need also different device file package.
Suitable Products
RH850
